30 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
31 Issue Date: 24/01/2003
32
33 This is an implementation of RFC2898, which specifies key derivation from
34 a password and a salt value.
35*/
36
37#ifndef PWD2KEY_H
38#define PWD2KEY_H
39
40#if defined(__cplusplus)
41extern "C"
42{
43#endif
44
45void derive_key(
46 const unsigned char pwd[], /* the PASSWORD, and */
47 unsigned int pwd_len, /* its length */
48 const unsigned char salt[], /* the SALT and its */
49 unsigned int salt_len, /* length */
50 unsigned int iter, /* the number of iterations */
51 unsigned char key[], /* space for the output key */
52 unsigned int key_len); /* and its required length */
53
54#if defined(__cplusplus)
55}
56#endif
57
58#endif
59
